newsitem.title: USA: Recovery Engineering in $14 mln credit pact.
newsitem.headline: Recovery Engineering in $14 mln credit pact.

text.p: Recovery Engineering Inc said Tuesday it has secured a $14 million credit facility with First Bank System Inc.
Under the discretionary agreement, Recovery Engineering has a $10 million working capital line of credit and a long-term $4 million equipment facility, the drinking water systems maker said.
Borrowings under this facility are limited to $10 million in 1997, by provisions in a previous convertible debt agreement, the company said.
"We expect this facility to provide the necessary financial support to meet our objectives for 1997," chief executive officer Brian Sullivan said in a news reelase.
Recovery Engineering shares rose 1/8 to 7-1/2 Tuesday.
